full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GLO BUR RKYEN BZLOG SER BU'I SGRA DBYANGS KYI MCHOD SBYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (GLO BUR RKYEN BZLOG BLUD SBYIN 'DI, KO SHRI BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL DANG, RANG GI NYE 'KHOR SLOB BU NI, BLO LDAN RIG GROL LA SOGS PAS, BSKUL PHYIR 'DOD LTAR CHOS RJE YIS, THA SHAL BSKAL BZANG MING CAN GYIS, SNGON MED SER BU'I SGRA @005A *, ,DBYANGS KYIS, LEGS BSHAD BCOL CHUNG 'DI SGRAGS PA'I, DGE BA'I MAR GYUR SEMS CAN RNAMS, GLO BUR RKYEN DANG BRAL GYUR CIG ,'DI LA MKHAS RNAMS THUGS MA 'KHREL, BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR BRGYAN DU BYON, 'PHRAL DU BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI AER KHE PI LIG THU YE SHES BLO LDAN NO, DGE'O,)
